title: How long does the Hunger Games go on for outside of the arena? - Quora
tags: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire (2013 movie)

response.answer_text: Not 100% certain of what you mean, but the Hunger Games (as in the spectacle that is described in the Hunger Games trilogy) goes on inside the arena (there is no easy way out, and it took 75 years with outside help for someone to actually accomplish it) until the last person stands. If all the competitors refused to fight then the people in charge would simply kill them off one by one with their traps until they all died.
